bibdata.title: IEEE Separable Insulated Connector Systems for Power Distribution Systems above 600 V
IEEE Separable Insulated Connector Systems for Power Distribution Systems above 600 V

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes definitions, electrical ratings, tests, and interchangeable construction features for load-break and nonload-break separable insulated connectors rated 601 V and above, 600 A or less, for use on power distribution systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
